definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: The golden school-time days have gone down in youth history and will not come back again.
sentences.chinese: 金色的学生时代，已载入了青春史册，一去不复还。

sentences.english: First, the disaster will forever hold a place in Japanese history.
sentences.chinese: 第一，这场灾难将永远记入日本的史册。

sentences.english: This earthquake caused the worst disaster ever recorded in history.
sentences.chinese: 这次由地震引起的最严重的灾难被永载史册。

sentences.english: The great achievements of Xiangnan Intifada have been recorded in history.
sentences.chinese: 湘南起义伟大功绩已经载入史册。

sentences.english: He made history by be the first man to swim from England to France.
sentences.chinese: 他是第一个从英国游到法国的，因而名垂史册。

sentences.english: You ask what I am thinking. So help me, God, an immortality of fame.
sentences.chinese: 你问我在想什么，愿上帝帮助我，我想永垂史册。

sentences.english: Quite the contrary, she seems intent on making history as Secretary of State.
sentences.chinese: 恰恰相反，她似乎一心想以国务卿身份而永载史册。

sentences.english: Thousands of years' history stays in the book sets.
sentences.chinese: 书台山，留下千年的史册。

sentences.english: It truly would have been a legendary tour.
sentences.chinese: 这本来将成为一次永载史册的传奇演出的。

sentences.english: Open the history books, I appreciate a gut-wrenching patriotism.
sentences.chinese: 翻开史册，我欣赏柔肠百转的爱国情。

sentences.english: Thousands of years of history. The newspaper nameless, a heart of pure loyalty.
sentences.chinese: 千年史册耻无名，一片丹心报天子。

sentences.english: He'll always be a part of this club and its history.
sentences.chinese: 他永远是曼联的一部分，他将载入曼联史册。

sentences.english: Sometimes the real trailblazers never get in the history books.
sentences.chinese: 有的时候，那些真正的先驱者一直都没有被记入史册。

sentences.english: Since then, Suotula and "Altamira cave art", containing annals.
sentences.chinese: 从此，索图拉与“阿尔塔米拉洞穴艺术”，共载史册。

sentences.english: In books, are embalmed the greatest thoughts of all ages.
sentences.chinese: 历代最伟大的思想都载入史册而不朽。

sentences.english: They will also fly into the history books.
sentences.chinese: 他们同样将被载入史册。

definition: to load into/to record/to write into/to enter (data)/to go into (the records)/to go down (in history)
lit. reputation will go down in history (idiom); fig. achievements will earn eternal glory
large inscribed stele/fig. great achievement/imperishable masterpiece
(of one's name, reputation etc) to be immortalized (idiom)/to leave a mark for generations to come
story or deed that captures the imagination and is spread far and wide
thick and heavy in colors/to describe sth in colorful language with attention to detail (idiom)
